meta.title: Humano Web | Bilingual & Accessible Web Design
meta.description: Your bilingual partner for web design, development, and maintenance. Humano Web brings your vision to life in English and Spanish with modern, responsive websites.

AboutPage.title: Info
AboutPage.description: Learn more about our mission and team.

who.title: Who Am I?
description: Hey! I’m Eligio Rosa, a web designer and full-stack developer based in Western Washington with over 10 years of experience building websites and digital tools that just work. I’ve worked with clients across Puerto Rico and the mainland U.S., from small schools to big companies, and now I’m focused on helping local businesses in the PNW stand out online.

I handle everything from clean, mobile-friendly designs to backend development with PHP, Node.js, and React. I’ve created hundreds of websites, deployed apps on AWS, managed databases, and built tools that solve real problems. Need a website in English and Spanish? No problem—I build fully bilingual pages that connect with all your customers.

Whether you're a small business needing a website or a creative needing a portfolio, I bring tech skills and a creative eye to the table. Not into tech talk? No worries. I keep it human, clear, and honest. Let’s make your idea real—and make it look good while we’re at it.

what.title: What I Do?
what.description: We’re here to make the web work for you. Whether you're building something new or need a fresh start, we’ve got your back with services that are practical, clean, and built to fit your goals:
services: Custom websites that not only look great on phones and desktops, but are also built for fast loading, strong SEO performance, and a smooth user experience.
Bilingual pages (English + Spanish) tailored to your audience, with accurate translations and intuitive layouts that make navigation easy in both languages.
Online stores and booking systems that are secure, streamlined, and user-friendly—perfect for selling products, offering services, or managing appointments and events in real time.
Branding, logos, and visual elements crafted to match your identity, helping you stand out with a look and feel that truly represents your business or project.
Ongoing support with updates, hosting, and maintenance, so your site stays up to date, secure, and running smoothly—without you having to worry about the technical stuff.
A custom, easy-to-manage CMS that puts you in control of your content—no extra steps, no clutter, just a simple and flexible editing experience.
what.footer: We don’t overcomplicate things—just solid, smart solutions to help you show up online.

questions.question: Do I need to know how to code?
questions.answer: Not at all. Our websites come with a user-friendly CMS, so you can update your content whenever you want—no technical knowledge required.

questions.question: Can you help me translate my site?
questions.answer: Yes! We specialize in bilingual websites and can provide translation assistance or structure your content for both English and Spanish audiences.

questions.question: What if I already have a website?
questions.answer: We can redesign, improve performance, or migrate your current content to a cleaner and more modern platform, keeping what works and fixing what doesn’t.

questions.question: How long does it take to build a website?
questions.answer: It depends on the complexity of the project, but most custom websites take about 4-6 weeks from start to finish.

questions.question: Do you offer ongoing support?
questions.answer: Yes! We provide maintenance packages that include updates, security checks, and backups to keep your site running smoothly.

questions.question: Can you help with SEO?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We build sites with SEO best practices in mind and can also provide ongoing SEO services to help improve your visibility online.

questions.question: What if I need help after my site is live?
questions.answer: We offer ongoing support and maintenance packages to ensure your site stays updated, secure, and running smoothly.

WorksPage.title: Works
WorksPage.description: Click the image to see more about the project.
WorksPage.keywords: web design, bilingual, accessible, custom websites, portfolio, web development

works.title: Bite Art
works.desc: a Spanish-language online magazine focused on gastronomy, chefs, food culture, and culinary events. This minmalist website was for the "foodies" of Puerto Rico, featuring articles, interviews, and event coverage. It was designed to be clean and easy to navigate, with a focus on high-quality images and engaging content. Also has a custom CMS that includes a recipe maker.
